name: Rahul Sharma
summary: Dynamic Java Development Manager with over 10 years of experience in software development and team leadership. Proven track record in managing large-scale projects, optimizing development processes, and fostering teamwork to deliver high-performance applications on time and within budget.

experience.title: Java Development Manager
experience.description:
Led a team of 15 developers in the successful delivery of 10+ enterprise-level applications.
Implemented Agile methodologies, reducing project delivery time by 30%.
Streamlined code review processes, increasing code quality and reducing bugs by 25%.

experience.title: Senior Java Developer
experience.description:
Designed and developed scalable microservices using Java Spring Boot, resulting in a 40% increase in application performance.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to define project specifications and deliver solutions aligned with client requirements.
Mentored junior developers, fostering a culture of continuous learning and improvement.

education.description: Specialized in software engineering and distributed systems with a focus on Java technologies.
